Posts.Content: Mar 12, 2011 02:08PM maxiey40 wrote: Hi havent posted in a while. I am scheduled for right mastectomy on March 22. The plan is to remove the breast and hopefully have TE.. Im a little bummed !  I was hoping to wake up from surgery with a fill but doctor says that they fill them after radiation? Having nodes removed as well.  My tumor was 7cm but with the chemo its almost gone. How is the recovery time for a single mastectomy? Im a little nervous but ready for the next step.. Good luck to all...
Posts.Title: March 2011 Mastectomy elmcity69 Glo3mom
